name: Blood Burger
description:
.Camera:  Two camera options: (Semi fixed and Third person).

.Movement:  Control tank style old ps1 games.

.Controller:  Keyboard and Mouse only.

.Graphics:  Inspired by old ps1 games and the era of vhs tapes.

.History:  Classic history of 80's slasher horror movies.

DEVELOPER'S NOTE: This is a difficult game, and it has very loud and desperate sounds. That mixes comedy and over-the-top horror, just like the classic 80's movies.
